title: Italian Brodo
introduction: This homemade broth, known as brodo, forms the basis of many Italian soups. It's simple to prepare and essential for imparting depth of flavor to your culinary creations.
ingredients: Various vegetables, meat, poultry, or fish

instructions.instruction: Combine water with vegetables, meat, poultry, or fish in a large pot.
Bring the mixture to a simmer and let it cook for several hours.
Strain the broth and discard the solids.
Freeze in small containers for sauces and larger ones for soups and risotto.

variations: Use different combinations of vegetables for varied flavors.
Incorporate more meat for a richer broth.
